name: Hiding info in animation
description:
Shows ways of hiding information in animation. On the left, animation reveals information. On the right, animation hides information.

The app was developed on a 15" laptop with a 1080p IPS screen with 60 Hz refresh rate, so the effect might not work as well on other types of devices.

Spoiler alert: The information I've hidden is in both cases the text "YO".
